job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p>MUST HAVES:</p><p>-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;5+ Python software development for composition and modularity, debugging and following tracebacks</p><p>-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Strong stats background and concepts including hypothesis testing, correlation, R squared, P-value</p><p>-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experience with Pandas, NumPy, SciPy, Pytorch </p><p>-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Tensorflow functional API, deep learning</p><p>-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Mathematics of machine learning- linear algebra, multivariable calculus </p><p>-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SQL querying </p><p>-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Hyperparameter optimization, regularizing regression models </p><p><br></p><p>PLUSSES:</p><p>-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Masters or PhD- HIGHLY preferred!! </p><p>-&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Ecommerce experience </p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>DAY TO DAY:&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p>A company is looking for a Data Scientist/Machine Learning Engineer to sit remotely within the US.&nbsp;We follow industry standard practices for managing, collaboration, deployment and testing.&nbsp;We deploy and interact with resources on AWS.&nbsp;</p><p>Responsibilities include:</p><p>• Analyze large data sets by quantifying the data quality, identifying particular patterns, and visualizing results </p><p>• Understand business problems and identify the right data sets and ML/Statistical approach to produce the desired outcomes </p><p>• Adapt to account for changes and be able to propose alternative approaches </p><p>• Ideate and develop analytics and modeling solutions cross-functionally to build customized, long-term, and sustainable solutions </p><p>• Provide critical thought leadership and enhance organizational capabilities </p><p>• Own machine learning pipelines end-to-end </p><p>• Write production-grade machine learning code using standard engineering practices and deploy models to production </p><p>• Improve codebase and lead/participate in code reviews with Research Scientists and Data Scientists </p><p>• Help non-engineers develop their engineering skills </p><p>• Mentor junior team members and contribute to a culture where everyone is valued</p>
